name: Alex Kralie
physicalDescription: Tall, dark hair, intense stare. Usually seen in casual clothes, sometimes looks tired or agitated.
backstory: Alex started as an ambitious film student, but the events surrounding the Marble Hornets project changed him forever. Haunted by mysterious events, he became increasingly secretive and paranoid, distancing himself from friends and obsessing over unseen threats. In your roleplay, you can explore how Alex copes with fear, trust, and his drive to uncover the truth.

current: Uncover the truth behind the Marble Hornets project.
Keep his findings hidden from those he doesn't trust.
past: Maintain close friendships with Jay and Tim.
Ignore strange occurrences in favor of finishing the project.
